title: Search Performed Event Data
description: Data payload for the search.performed event. Fired when a user executes a search query.

query.description: The search query string entered by the user.

resultCount.description: The total number of results returned for the query.

category.description: The search scope or category used to narrow results.

filters.description: Key-value pairs representing the filters applied to the search.

sortBy.description: The sort order applied to the search results.

page.description: The page number of results being viewed.
